roleset.name: search for using google search engine
roleset.note: GOOGLE-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Comparison to 'Baidu', 'Blackle'. No VNcls. (from google.01-v)

example.name: from BOLT
example.text: I just Googled Google and when I click on the first selection it takes me to the white Google page , so apparently we still have a choice .
